tooltip: Select Nardu the White as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Nardu focuses on quickly picking a deity to gain its advantages.
Allows you to summon Nardu, a support hero that can brainwash enemy soldiers.
Can attach itself to a Battalion and has a chance to temporarily convert an enemy unit it attacks.
First choice of deity costs no resources and requires no structures.
Enables training of Dinolfos Footman or Chameleofos Striker, depending on chosen deity.
